mn63:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn63:3.3: Atha kho āyasmato mālukyaputtassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
mn63:3.5: ‘sassato loko’tipi, ‘asassato loko’tipi, ‘antavā loko’tipi, ‘anantavā loko’tipi, ‘taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran’tipi, ‘aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran’tipi, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi—
mn63:3.7: Yāni me bhagavā na byākaroti taṃ me na ruccati, taṃ me nakkhamati.
mn63:3.12: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā—
mn63:3.17: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā—
mn63:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā mālukyaputto sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn63:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā mālukyaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn63:5.1: “Idha mayhaṃ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
mn63:5.2: yānimāni diṭṭhigatāni bhagavatā abyākatāni ṭhapitāni paṭikkhittāni:
mn63:5.5: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi—
mn63:5.7: Yāni me bhagavā na byākaroti taṃ me na ruccati, taṃ me nakkhamati.
mn63:5.12: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā—
mn63:5.17: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā—
mn63:5.24: ‘sassato loko’ti vā, ‘asassato loko’ti vā, ajānato kho pana apassato etadeva ujukaṃ hoti yadidaṃ:
mn63:5.31: ‘antavā loko’ti vā, ‘anantavā loko’ti vā, ajānato kho pana apassato etadeva ujukaṃ hoti yadidaṃ:
mn63:5.34: ‘taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran’ti, ‘taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran’ti me bhagavā byākarotu;
mn63:5.36: ‘aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran’ti, ‘aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran’ti me bhagavā byākarotu.
mn63:5.38: ‘taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran’ti vā, ‘aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran’ti vā, ajānato kho pana apassato etadeva ujukaṃ hoti yadidaṃ:
mn63:5.41: ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti me bhagavā byākarotu;
mn63:5.43: ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti me bhagavā byākarotu.
mn63:5.45: ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā, ajānato kho pana apassato etadeva ujukaṃ hoti yadidaṃ:
mn63:5.48: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti me bhagavā byākarotu;
mn63:5.50: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti me bhagavā byākarotu.
mn63:5.52: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā, ajānato kho pana apassato etadeva ujukaṃ hoti yadidaṃ:
mn63:6.2: ‘ehi tvaṃ, mālukyaputta, mayi brahmacariyaṃ cara, ahaṃ te byākarissāmi:
mn63:6.3: “sassato loko”ti vā, “asassato loko”ti vā, “antavā loko”ti vā, “anantavā loko”ti vā, “taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran”ti vā, “aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran”ti vā, “hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā, “na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā, “hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā, “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā’”ti?
mn63:8.2: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ carissāmi, bhagavā me byākarissati:
mn63:8.3: “sassato loko”ti vā, “asassato loko”ti vā, “antavā loko”ti vā, “anantavā loko”ti vā, “taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran”ti vā, “aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran”ti vā, “hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā, “na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā, “hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā, “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā’”ti?
mn63:10.2: ‘ehi tvaṃ, mālukyaputta, mayi brahmacariyaṃ cara, ahaṃ te byākarissāmi:
mn63:10.5: “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”’ti;
mn63:10.7: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ carissāmi, bhagavā me byākarissati:
mn63:10.10: “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā’ti.
mn63:10.11: Evaṃ sante, moghapurisa, ko santo kaṃ paccācikkhasi?
mn63:11.2: ‘na tāvāhaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ carissāmi yāva me bhagavā na byākarissati:
mn63:11.5: “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā’ti, abyākatameva taṃ, mālukyaputta, tathāgatena assa, atha so puggalo kālaṃ kareyya.
mn63:11.6: Seyyathāpi, mālukyaputta, puriso sallena viddho assa savisena gāḷhapalepanena.
mn63:11.7: Tassa mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā bhisakkaṃ sallakattaṃ upaṭṭhapeyyuṃ.
mn63:11.9: ‘na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ sallaṃ āharissāmi yāva na taṃ purisaṃ jānāmi yenamhi viddho, khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso vā suddo vā’ti;
mn63:11.11: ‘na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ sallaṃ āharissāmi yāva na taṃ purisaṃ jānāmi yenamhi viddho, evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto iti vā’ti;
mn63:11.13: ‘na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ sallaṃ āharissāmi yāva na taṃ purisaṃ jānāmi yenamhi viddho, dīgho vā rasso vā majjhimo vā’ti;
mn63:11.15: ‘na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ sallaṃ āharissāmi yāva na taṃ purisaṃ jānāmi yenamhi viddho, kāḷo vā sāmo vā maṅguracchavī vā’ti;
mn63:11.17: ‘na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ sallaṃ āharissāmi yāva na taṃ purisaṃ jānāmi yenamhi viddho, amukasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā nagare vā’ti;
mn63:11.19: ‘na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ sallaṃ āharissāmi yāva na taṃ dhanuṃ jānāmi yenamhi viddho, yadi vā cāpo yadi vā kodaṇḍo’ti;
mn63:11.21: ‘na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ sallaṃ āharissāmi yāva na taṃ jiyaṃ jānāmi yāyamhi viddho, yadi vā akkassa yadi vā saṇhassa yadi vā nhārussa yadi vā maruvāya yadi vā khīrapaṇṇino’ti;
mn63:11.23: ‘na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ sallaṃ āharissāmi yāva na taṃ kaṇḍaṃ jānāmi yenamhi viddho, yadi vā gacchaṃ yadi vā ropiman’ti;
mn63:11.25: ‘na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ sallaṃ āharissāmi yāva na taṃ kaṇḍaṃ jānāmi yenamhi viddho, yassa pattehi vājitaṃ yadi vā gijjhassa yadi vā kaṅkassa yadi vā kulalassa yadi vā morassa yadi vā sithilahanuno’ti;
mn63:11.27: ‘na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ sallaṃ āharissāmi yāva na taṃ kaṇḍaṃ jānāmi yenamhi viddho, yassa nhārunā parikkhittaṃ yadi vā gavassa yadi vā mahiṃsassa yadi vā bheravassa yadi vā semhārassā’ti;
mn63:11.29: ‘na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ sallaṃ āharissāmi yāva na taṃ sallaṃ jānāmi yenamhi viddho, yadi vā sallaṃ yadi vā khurappaṃ yadi vā vekaṇḍaṃ yadi vā nārācaṃ yadi vā vacchadantaṃ yadi vā karavīrapattan’ti—
mn63:11.30: aññātameva taṃ, mālukyaputta, tena purisena assa, atha so puriso kālaṃ kareyya.
mn63:11.31: Evameva kho, mālukyaputta, yo evaṃ vadeyya:
mn63:11.32: ‘na tāvāhaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ carissāmi yāva me bhagavā na byākarissati:
mn63:11.35: “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā’ti—
mn63:11.36: abyākatameva taṃ, mālukyaputta, tathāgatena assa, atha so puggalo kālaṃ kareyya.
mn63:12.1: ‘Sassato loko’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso abhavissāti, evaṃ no.
mn63:12.2: ‘Asassato loko’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso abhavissāti, evampi no.
mn63:12.3: ‘Sassato loko’ti vā, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati, ‘asassato loko’ti vā diṭṭhiyā sati attheva jāti, atthi jarā, atthi maraṇaṃ, santi sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā;
mn63:12.5: ‘Antavā loko’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso abhavissāti, evaṃ no.
mn63:12.6: ‘Anantavā loko’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso abhavissāti, evampi no.
mn63:12.7: ‘Antavā loko’ti vā, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati, ‘anantavā loko’ti vā diṭṭhiyā sati attheva jāti, atthi jarā, atthi maraṇaṃ, santi sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā;
mn63:12.9: ‘Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso abhavissāti, evaṃ no.
mn63:12.10: ‘Aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso abhavissāti, evampi no.
mn63:12.11: ‘Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran’ti vā, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati, ‘aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran’ti vā diṭṭhiyā sati attheva jāti …
mn63:12.14: ‘Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso abhavissāti, evaṃ no.
mn63:12.15: ‘Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso abhavissāti, evampi no.
mn63:12.16: ‘Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā diṭṭhiyā sati attheva jāti …
mn63:12.19: ‘Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso abhavissāti, evaṃ no.
mn63:12.20: ‘Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso abhavissāti, evampi no.
mn63:12.21: ‘Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhiyā sati, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā diṭṭhiyā sati attheva jāti …
mn63:13.1: Tasmātiha, mālukyaputta, abyākatañca me abyākatato dhāretha;
mn63:13.19: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti—
mn63:13.21: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti—
mn63:13.24: Na hetaṃ, mālukyaputta, atthasaṃhitaṃ na ādibrahmacariyakaṃ na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṃvattati.
mn63:13.35: Etañhi, mālukyaputta, atthasaṃhitaṃ etaṃ ādibrahmacariyakaṃ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
mn63:13.37: Tasmātiha, mālukyaputta, abyākatañca me abyākatato dhāretha;
mn63:14.2: Attamano āyasmā mālukyaputto bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
